DOC.brief_summary: We hypothesize that patients with Ch.HCV have a low level of vitamin D, and that by raising their vitamin D levels by adding it to their standard treament of Pegylated Interferon and Ribavirin, there will be an increase in their sustained virological response.
DOC.brief_title: Vitamin D Treatment in Patients With Chronic Hepatitis C
DOC.criteria: Chronic Hepatitis C Genotype 1 Vitamin D intoxication Renal Failure Liver Failure Malignancy
